namelist_GlobalOcean.xml
Description Diagnostics to support the evaluation of ocean biogeochemical cycles at global scales. Implemented routines produce time series lines and contour plots (for climatological distributions or inter-annual or inter-seasonal variability) using either 2-D (surface) or 3-D (depth-resolving) ocean variables.
